entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers or drizzle. Low plus 1. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of showers or drizzle early this evening. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 30 gusting to 60 this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early in the morning. High plus 5. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the evening. Risk of freezing rain late in the evening and overnight. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
